skillTree.localised_description: Tzeentch's authority is absolute, for infinite change is the very nature of Chaos.

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Ability: "Locus of Conjuration"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect increases proportional to the number of friendly units in range

skillTree.localised_description: Screeching through the air like few before them, they would be a wonderous sight to behold if their coming did not always spell death and, as is their namesake, total and utter doom.

effects.description:
Bound spell: "Treason of Tzeentch" for Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Number of uses: +1 for bound spells on Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs. Infantry: +8 for Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The Eagle protects me, for I am but a vessel of change!"

effects.description: Melee defence: +8
Barrier hit points: +200

skillTree.localised_description: The Winds of Magic twist and churn around Tzeentch's almighty Paragons of Change.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve minimum: +10
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

skillTree.localised_description: When Melekh left for the Chaos Wastes, eventually finding a portal into the Realm of Chaos itself. There, he was beset by daemons of Tzeentch, but by mastering his fear, he forced them to submit to his will, enslaving an army of gibbering Horrors, flickering Flamers and rapacious Screamers to protect him.

effects.description:
Barrier: +10% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch, Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch, Flamers of Tzeentch and Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Enables warpflame attacks for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The arcane fire of Tzeentch shall never be quenched!

effects.description: Cooldown: -30% to Lore of Fire spells

Enables flaming attacks
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic and Chaos are eternally intertwined in a symbiotic storm of malevolent power.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +3 per turn
	(Lord's army)

Miscast base chance: +15% for all enemy spellcasters
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic need not only wreak havoc at range—half the fun of battle, after all, is seeing the fear in your enemy's eyes.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5
Melee defence: +7

skillTree.localised_description: The Forsaken heed the commands of the powerful, and thrive on the excess of their energy.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: The Daemons of Chaos bay for blood, spurred on by a chorus of agonised screams.

skillTree.localised_description: As dark wings take to the skies and Daemon arrows bear down, the enemies of Chaos know their end is near.

skillTree.localised_description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

skillTree.localised_description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

skillTree.localised_description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 20% for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

effects.description:

	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

skillTree.localised_description: To devastate one's enemies from afar is the key to controlling the battlefield.

Ability: "Stand or Die!"

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.localised_description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.localised_description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

skillTree.localised_description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle
